for <S%G3985><s%> forty <S%G5062><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> being <S%G3985><s%> tempted <S%G3985><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> the devil. <S%G1228><s%> He <S%G2532><s%> ate <S%G5315><s%> nothing <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3762><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> days. <S%G2250><s%> Afterward, <S%G2532><s%> when they <S%G846><s%> were completed, <S%G4931><s%> he was hungry. <S%G3983><s%>

The devil, <S%G1228><s%> leading <S%G321><s%> him <S%G846><s%> up <S%G321><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> a <S%G3735><s%> high <S%G5308><s%> mountain, <S%G3735><s%> showed <S%G1166><s%> him <S%G846><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the kingdoms <S%G932><s%> of the world <S%G3625><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a moment <S%G4743><s%> of time. <S%G5550><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> will worship <S%G4352><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> me, <S%G3450><s%> it will all <S%G3956><s%> be <S%G2071><s%> yours. <S%G4675><s%>"

When <S%G4931><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%> had completed <S%G4931><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> temptation, <S%G3986><s%> he departed <S%G868><s%> from <S%G575><s%> him <S%G846><s%> until <S%G891><s%> another time. <S%G2540><s%>

He <S%G846><s%> taught <S%G1321><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> synagogues, <S%G4864><s%> being glorified <S%G1392><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> all. <S%G3956><s%>

The <S%G2532><s%> book <S%G975><s%> of the prophet <S%G4396><s%> Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> was handed <S%G1929><s%> to him. <S%G846><s%> He opened <S%G380><s%> the book, <S%G975><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> the place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> it was <S%G2258><s%> written, <S%G1125><s%>

and to proclaim <S%G2784><s%> the acceptable <S%G1184><s%> year <S%G1763><s%> of the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>"

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G99999><s%> truly <S%G225><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> there were <S%G2258><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> widows <S%G5503><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Israel <S%G2474><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> of Elijah, <S%G2243><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> the sky <S%G3772><s%> was shut up <S%G2808><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> six <S%G1803><s%> months, <S%G3376><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> a <S%G1909><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> famine <S%G3042><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the land. <S%G1093><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They <S%G3956><s%> were all filled <S%G4130><s%> with wrath <S%G2372><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the synagogue, <S%G4864><s%> as they heard <S%G191><s%> these things. <S%G5023><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> he, <S%G846><s%> passing <S%G1330><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> their <S%G846><s%> midst, <S%G3319><s%> went his way. <S%G4198><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> they were astonished <S%G1605><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> teaching, <S%G1322><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> his <S%G846><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> authority. <S%G1849><s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Ah! <S%G5101><s%> what have we to do <S%G2254><s%> with you, <S%G4671><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of Nazareth? <S%G3479><s%> Have you come <S%G2064><s%> to destroy <S%G622><s%> us? <S%G2248><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> you are: <S%G1488><s%> the Holy One <S%G40><s%> of God! <S%G2316><s%>"

Amazement <S%G2285><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> all, <S%G3956><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they spoke <S%G4814><s%> together, <S%G4314><s%> one with another, <S%G240><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> is this <S%G3778><s%> word? <S%G3056><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> power <S%G1411><s%> he commands <S%G2004><s%> the unclean <S%G169><s%> spirits, <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they come out! <S%G1831><s%>"
News <S%G2279><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> him <S%G846><s%> went out <S%G1607><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> of the surrounding region. <S%G4066><s%>

He <S%G1161><s%> rose <S%G450><s%> up <S%G450><s%> from the synagogue, <S%G4864><s%> and entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%>'s house. <S%G3614><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%>'s mother-in <S%G3994><s%>-law was <S%G2258><s%> afflicted with <S%G4912><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> fever, <S%G4446><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they begged <S%G2065><s%> him <S%G846><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> her. <S%G846><s%>

He <S%G2532><s%> stood <S%G2186><s%> over <S%G1883><s%> her, <S%G846><s%> and rebuked <S%G2008><s%> the fever; <S%G4446><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> it left <S%G863><s%> her. <S%G846><s%> Immediately <S%G3916><s%> she rose <S%G450><s%> up and served <S%G1247><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

When <S%G1161><s%> the sun <S%G2246><s%> was setting, <S%G1416><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> those who <S%G3745><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> any sick <S%G770><s%> with various <S%G4164><s%> diseases <S%G3554><s%> brought <S%G71><s%> them <S%G846><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him; <S%G846><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> he laid <S%G2007><s%> his hands <S%G5495><s%> on every <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of them, <S%G846><s%> and healed <S%G2323><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>

Demons <S%G1140><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> came out <S%G1831><s%> from <S%G575><s%> many, <S%G4183><s%> crying out, <S%G2896><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> saying, <S%G3754><s%> "You <S%G4771><s%> are <S%G1488><s%> the Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God! <S%G2316><s%>" Rebuking <S%G2008><s%> them, <S%G3756><s%> he didn't allow <S%G1439><s%> them <S%G846><s%> to speak, <S%G2980><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they knew <S%G1492><s%> that he <S%G846><s%> was <S%G1511><s%> the Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

When <S%G1161><s%> it was <S%G1096><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> he departed <S%G1831><s%> and went <S%G4198><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> an uninhabited <S%G2048><s%> place, <S%G5117><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> looked <S%G2212><s%> for him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G2193><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> held <S%G2722><s%> on to him, <S%G846><s%> so that he wouldn't <S%G3361><s%> go away <S%G4198><s%> from <S%G575><s%> them. <S%G846><s%>
